body:
This issue only covers translating things that are a part of the system add-on. So far that is about:studies, and [a preference we inject into about:preferences](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/master/recipe-client-addon/lib/ShieldPreferences.jsm#L95-L147). Studies that need localization will need to implement their own, separate, localization.

Frequency of code updates vary, and whether the can ship directly to release varies depending on the type of change. For string changes, I think we could ship directly to all channels instead of riding the trains, but I'd like to hear more about the options.
